1 packet SPLENDAÂ® Flavors for Coffee, French Vanilla

des: "This easy-to-make snack is a fun and flavorful take on a classic favorite."
ins:
Mix all peanut butter ball ingredients together in a small bowl.  Roll into six balls.  Roll balls in graham cracker crumbs,
Press a small indentation in center with fingertip.  Fill with jelly.  Serve immediately.
